info.title: Qiita
info.description: Qiita is a service for recording and sharing engineering knowledge. You can easily record and publish your programming tips, know-how, and notes.

coediting.description: Whether this article is in joint update status.
coediting.title: Coediting

comments_count.description: Number of comments on this article
comments_count.title: Comments Count

created_at.description: Date and time the data was created
created_at.title: Created at

private.description: Flag indicating limited sharing status or not
private.title: Private

stocks_count.description: Number of times this article has been stocked
stocks_count.title: Stocks count

tags.description: List of tags attached to the article
tags.title: Tags

updated_at.description: Date and time the data was last updated
updated_at.title: Updated at

followees_count.description: Number of users this user is following
followees_count.title: User followees count

followers_count.description: Number of users following this user
followers_count.title: User followers count

items_count.description: Number of articles this user has published on qiita.com
items_count.title: User items count

organization.description: The organization to which the user belongs
organization.title: User organization

permanent_id.description: Integer ID assigned to each user
permanent_id.title: User permanent id

profile_image_url.description: URL of the profile image you have set up
profile_image_url.title: User profile image url

team_only.description: Whether it is set to Qiita Team exclusive mode
team_only.title: User team only

website_url.description: URL of the website that the user has set up
website_url.title: User Website URL

team_membership.description: Represents Qiita Team team member information.
team_membership.title: Team membership

get.description: Returns a list of posts in descending order of creation date.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of elements per page (from 1 to 100)
